About

FRS Inc. is a provider of electronic security products and services primarily focused on video for commercial applications. Established July 2006, the goal continues to be providing customized solutions, within vertical industry sectors, with the best of current industry offerings and service to match to clients.

Our leadership’s twenty plus years of experience provides a vetted filter in navigating the ‘ocean’ of product within the industry. This filter is based on matching product core value to mitigate risk, costs and providing a lasting solution.

FRS Inc. values long term relationships, built on trust and the symbiotic pursuit of delivering maximum value within the market place.

Leadership

Timothy F. Miller, the founder of Financial Retail Security Inc, has over twenty years experience in electronic security.

Prior to founding FRS Inc. in 2006, Tim was division leader of manufactured product at a national security systems integrator (1996-2006). He’d conceptualized the division he eventually lead, brought on board and developed a top 5 client and had two of the top 10 clients of the company. One of three sales executives (total of 21) to sell over $2,000,000 (6.6% of overall sales). Furthermore, he developed a client base in a broad geography throughout the western hemisphere & the pacific. The vast majority of said geography, the integrator had never had market share in.

He’d started in the industry at an optics factory (1993 - 1995). Tim is fluent in Spanish, successfully having completed immersion studies at Escuela de Español, San Josĕ El Viejo, in the city of Antigua. Prior, Tim received his Bachelors Degree, studying business and psychology (Organizational Behavior) at the University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, where he was an NCAA Division I athlete running on the cross country traveling team. He was three time cross country and track state champion (Michigan) and city athlete of the year. the year.

Clients

FRS Inc. values long term relationships, built on trust and the symbiotic pursuit of delivering maximum value within the market place. Please contact us for a reference relevant to your needs.
